message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I can see you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $90. I'm willing to compromise, how about $105?
I understand you're willing to compromise, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go lower?
I'm getting closer to meeting you in the middle, but I still need to make a profit. How about $100?
I'm getting close, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm almost there, but I still need a bit more. How about $99?
I'm really close, but I still think we can do better. Would you be willing to meet me at $97?
I'm not going to give up yet! How about $98? It's just one dollar more than your last offer.
I appreciate the effort, but I'm really close to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $96?
